languages.text:
Ваш корабль оснащен боевыми орудиям — они отличаются диапазоном обстрела и позволяют вашему кораблю атаковать противников разными способами.
Корабль может атаковать каждым орудием раз в ход — одновременно с перемещением, при этом атака на ходу не прекратит передвижение корабля.

Your ship is equipped with an arsenal of weapons, which differ in terms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of fire and offer you a variety of ways to assault your opponents.
The ship can attack with each of its weapons once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Note these can be fired as the ship moves as attacking does not end the ship's movement.
languages.original_text:
Ваш корабль оснащен боевыми орудиям — они отличаются диапазоном обстрела и позволяют вашему кораблю атаковать противников разными способами.
Корабль может атаковать каждым орудием раз в ход — одновременно с перемещением, при этом атака на ходу не прекратит передвижение корабля.

traits.locale_text:
Your ship is equipped with an arsenal of weapons, which differ in terms of range of fire and offer you a variety of ways to assault your opponents.
The ship can attack with each of its weapons once per turn as it moves around the battlefield. Note that attacking does not end the ship's movement.

Your ship is equipped with an arsenal of weapons, which differ in terms of range of fire and offer you a variety of ways to assault your opponents.
The ship can attack with each of its weapons once per turn as it moves around the battlefield. Note that attacking does not end the ship's movement.

Your ship is equipped with an arsenal of weapons, which differ in terms of range of fire and offer you a variety of ways to assault your opponents.
The ship can attack with each of its weapons once per turn. Note these can be fired as the ship moves as attacking does not end the ship's movement.

Your ship is equipped with an arsenal of weapons, which differ in terms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of fire and offer you a variety of ways to assault your opponents.
The ship can attack with each of its weapons once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Note these can be fired as the ship moves as attacking does not end the ship's movement.

Your ship is equipped with an arsenal of weapons, which differ in terms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of fire and offer you a variety of ways to assault your opponents.
The ship can attack with each of its weapons once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Note these can be fired as the ship moves as attacking does not end the ship's movement.

languages.text:
Tu nave está equipada con un arsenal de armas con diferentes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcances{/g}, que ofrecen diversas formas de eliminar a tus enemigos.
La nave puede atacar con cada una de sus armas una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Ten en cuenta que puedes disparar durante el movimiento, puesto que atacar no finaliza el movimiento de la nave.
languages.original_text:
Your ship is equipped with an arsenal of weapons, which differ in terms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of fire and offer you a variety of ways to assault your opponents.
The ship can attack with each of its weapons once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Note these can be fired as the ship moves as attacking does not end the ship's movement.

traits.locale_text:
Tu nave está equipada con un arsenal de armas con diferentes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcances{/g}, que ofrecen diversas formas de eliminar a tus enemigos.
La nave puede atacar con cada una de sus armas una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Ten en cuenta que puedes disparar durante el movimiento, puesto que atacar no finaliza el movimiento de la nave.

languages.text:
船には射程{g|Encyclopedia:Range}距離{/g}の異なる様々な武器が装備されているため、敵を攻撃する方法は多様である。
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}につき1度、それぞれの武器で攻撃することができる。攻撃しても船が止まることはないため、移動しながら攻撃できる。
languages.original_text:
Your ship is equipped with an arsenal of weapons, which differ in terms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of fire and offer you a variety of ways to assault your opponents.
The ship can attack with each of its weapons once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Note these can be fired as the ship moves as attacking does not end the ship's movement.

traits.locale_text:
船には射程{g|Encyclopedia:Range}距離{/g}の異なる様々な武器が装備されているため、敵を攻撃する方法は多様である。
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとに1度だけ、それぞれの武器で攻撃することができる。攻撃しても船が止まることはないため、移動しながら発射できる。

languages.text:
您的舰船配备各种各样的武器，这些武器的射程各不相同，可以为您提供多种攻击方式。{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}
舰船每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}可以使用每种武器攻击一次。请注意，这些武器可以在舰船移动过程中开火，武器开火并不会终止舰船的移动阶段。
languages.original_text:
Your ship is equipped with an arsenal of weapons, which differ in terms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of fire and offer you a variety of ways to assault your opponents.
The ship can attack with each of its weapons once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Note these can be fired as the ship moves as attacking does not end the ship's movement.

traits.locale_text:
您的舰船配备各种各样的武器，这些武器的射程各不相同，可以为您提供多种攻击方式。{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}
舰船每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}可以使用每种武器攻击一次。请注意，这些武器可以在舰船移动过程中开火，武器开火并不会终止舰船的移动阶段。

languages.text:
Dein Schiff ist mit einem Arsenal von Waffen ausgerüstet, die sich in ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Feuerreichweite{/g} unterscheiden und dir eine Vielzahl von Möglichkeiten bieten, deine Gegner anzugreifen.
Das Schiff kann mit jeder seiner Waffen einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} angreifen. Beachte, dass diese Waffen abgefeuert werden können, während sich das Schiff bewegt, da das Angreifen die Bewegung des Schiffes nicht beendet.
languages.original_text:
Your ship is equipped with an arsenal of weapons, which differ in terms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of fire and offer you a variety of ways to assault your opponents.
The ship can attack with each of its weapons once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Note these can be fired as the ship moves as attacking does not end the ship's movement.

traits.locale_text:
Dein Schiff ist mit einem Arsenal von Waffen ausgerüstet, die sich in ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Feuerreichweite{/g} unterscheiden und dir eine Vielzahl von Möglichkeiten bieten, deine Gegner anzugreifen.
Das Schiff kann mit jeder seiner Waffen einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} angreifen. Beachte, dass diese Waffen abgefeuert werden können, während sich das Schiff bewegt, da das Angreifen die Bewegung des Schiffes nicht beendet.

languages.text:
Votre vaisseau est équipé d'un arsenal d'armes, qui diffèrent en termes de {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} de tir et vous offrent divers moyens d'attaquer vos adversaires.
Le vaisseau peut attaquer avec chacune de ses armes une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Notez que ces armes peuvent être utilisées lorsque le vaisseau se déplace, car l'attaque ne met pas fin à ses déplacements.
languages.original_text:
Your ship is equipped with an arsenal of weapons, which differ in terms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of fire and offer you a variety of ways to assault your opponents.
The ship can attack with each of its weapons once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Note these can be fired as the ship moves as attacking does not end the ship's movement.

traits.locale_text:
Votre vaisseau est équipé d'un arsenal d'armes, qui diffèrent en termes de {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} de tir et vous offrent divers moyens d'attaquer vos adversaires.

languages.text:
Gemin, ateş {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzili{/g} açısından farklılık gösteren ve sana çeşitli saldırı yolları sunan bir silah cephaneliğiyle donatılmıştır.
Gemi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} içerisinde bu silahlardan her biriyle bir kez saldırabilir. Saldırı, geminin hareketini sona erdirmediği için bu silahları gemi hareket hâlindeyken de ateşleyebilirsin.
languages.original_text:
Your ship is equipped with an arsenal of weapons, which differ in terms of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} of fire and offer you a variety of ways to assault your opponents.
The ship can attack with each of its weapons once per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Note these can be fired as the ship moves as attacking does not end the ship's movement.
